mapper.select: select a.*,orginal.name as orginal_name,target.name as target_name from ems_trim a, ( select id, name from ems_store union all select id,name||'('||code||')' as name from ems_pole union all select id,name from ems_workunit ) orginal ,( select id, name from ems_store union all select id,name||'('||code||')' as name from ems_pole union all select id,name from ems_workunit ) target where a.orginal_id=orginal.id and a.target_id=target.id and a.check_id=#{check_id}
